title:
Spherical to Cartesian Coordinates Transformation for Solid Harmonics
  Revisited
abstract:
Spherical Harmonic Gaussian type orbitals and Slater functions can be
expressed using spherical coordinates or a linear combinations of the
appropriate Cartesian functions. General expressions for the transformation
coefficients between the two representations are provided. Values for the
transformation coefficients are tabulated up to the quantum number $\ell = 10$.
